name: [NO SIGNAL]
description:
[NO SIGNAL] is a challenging shoot-em-up with a twist: your ship is moving in orbit around the Earth!

Control the spaceship from the satellite dish on the ground, but stay out of the deadzone! If your ship enters the deadzone, the controls will lock and you won't be able to change them until you're out of the deadzone.

How long can you keep the ship in orbit?

A gamepad / controller is highly recommended.

Created by Sammy Flemington for Major-Jam: Isolation 

Created with GameMaker: Studio 1.4

Music and sound created in FL Studio 20

Artwork created in PyxelEdit

This is my first game jam, so any feedback would be greatly appreciated! Have fun! :)
